modName: The Banhammer - A weapon to kill bullshit NPCs
summary: Have you ever encountered an enemy who does too much damage, even though your armour makes you look a tank? Are you sick of low-leveled NPCs somehow dealing nearly half your health, even though you're level 50 something? This Banhammer will help you with this problem.
descriptionHtml:
[i][u]Description
[/u][/i]
-Have you ever encountered an enemy who does too much damage, even though your armour makes you look and feel like a tank? Are you sick of low-leveled NPCs somehow dealing nearly half your health, even though you're level 50 something? This Banhammer will help you with this problem

[u]What does this hammer do?
[/u]
-Deals over 3,000 damage

-Works especially well against Ancient Dragons

-Obviously not lore-friendly

[u]How do I get one of these hammers?[/u]

-Get it in a completely inconspicuous** barrel behind "Warmaiden's" in Whiterun

or, if you're that lazy,Â 

-Use the console command: "player.additem 0036C9 1" (Without quotation marks, of course)

[u]What do I need in order to run this mod?

[/u]-the Dragonborn DLC







[u]Credits:

[/u]Bethesda, of course, for making this great game.



**If you cannot find the barrel, you need to get your eyes checked
author: Kurtwild
